title: Is This Email About a Google Plus Settlement Real?
subtitle: If you were a Google Plus user between 2015 and early 2019, you could receive compensation from this class action lawsuit.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: According to an August 2020 email, some former Google Plus users were eligible for a cash payment from a 2018 lawsuit settlement after a software issue exposed the private data of up to half a million users of the social network.
